# Element-wise binary op benchmark

## Notation

- tr: Triton
- to: Torch
- toc: Torch Compile

## H100

### Speed

```
ewbo-speed-fwd-add-batch64-bf16:
         n        tr        to       toc
0    256.0  0.033503  0.051740  0.058642
1    512.0  0.056616  0.093965  0.069697
2   1024.0  0.104844  0.179135  0.095324
3   2048.0  0.200456  0.349936  0.182990
4   4096.0  0.391255  0.691276  0.358100
5   8192.0  0.773126  1.373543  0.710105
6  16384.0  1.535891  2.734285  1.413874
7  32768.0  3.059176  5.466230  2.821915

ewbo-speed-bwd-add-batch64-bf16:
         n        tr        to       toc
0    256.0  0.575965  0.849905  1.500029
1    512.0  0.848858  0.311553  0.565401
2   1024.0  0.624481  0.352991  0.857844
3   2048.0  0.710347  0.375389  0.388095
4   4096.0  1.031206  0.730399  1.156524
5   8192.0  1.389712  1.440528  1.500687
6  16384.0  2.762967  2.856424  2.987622
7  32768.0  5.509270  5.987920  5.961280
```
